entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow or wet snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
